name: Perky Little Things
description:
Perky Little Things is a hilarious 18+ adult cartoon hidden object game.
A story of naughty cherubim, who travels to different worlds and helps people to find some love.Find and collect different items on each level and hand them out to those characters who need them most.
Actually Perky Little Things is a full-format game based on Christmas Eve In Metropolis
So if you like that small free game - you won't be disappointed!Incredibly fun levels, each one contains over 50 crazy animations:
Christmas Eve - done
School Of Black Magic - done
Pirates Of Southern Seas - in progress
Vikings
Vampires
Tropic Adventures
Fitness Club
TV Show
Wild West
Sci-Fi... and maybe even more!
Follow us on Steam to stay informed about updates!
Cheers!
